channel.title: [iClarity] help
channel.description: I want to add new skills and I have the handlers itself but idk what and where to import to get them to work. Can somebody please help I really want to add some skills.

item.title: [iClarity] help
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
@sheeba wrote:

[code]/*

  • Class Farming
  • Version 1.0
  • 8 aug 09
  • Created by Wouha
    */

package com.iClarity.player.Skills;

import java.io.;
import com.iClarity.npcs.;
import com.iClarity.misc.;
import com.iClarity.player.;
import com.iClarity.GameEngine;
import com.iClarity.player.clientHandler;

public class Farming {

/**

  • Constructor
    */
    public Farming() {

}

/*

  • Handles Farming
    */
    public static void Farming(clientHandler p, int objectID, int objectX, int objectY, int itemID) {

if(itemID == 5297 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 1) { // the level you will need to maket hat
p.deleteItem(5297, p.getItemSlot(5297), 1); // deletes the seed
p.addItem(2436, 1); // gives you the item if you farmed
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18); // adds exp to farming ( 18 ) is farming i think
p.setAnimation(364); // does an emote so you know when you do it (not the correct)
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 1 to make this potion.”); // this should everyone know lol
}
}
if(itemID == 5299 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 10) {
p.deleteItem(5299, p.getItemSlot(5299), 1);
p.addItem(2436, 1);
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18);
p.setAnimation(364);
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 10 to make this herb.”);
}
}
if(itemID == 5301 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 20) {
p.deleteItem(5301, p.getItemSlot(5301), 1);
p.addItem(2436, 1);
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18);
p.setAnimation(364);
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 20 to make this herb.”);
}
}
if(itemID == 5302 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 30) {
p.deleteItem(5302, p.getItemSlot(5302), 1);
p.addItem(2436, 1);
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18);
p.setAnimation(364);
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 30 to make this herb.”);
}
}
if(itemID == 5303 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 50) {
p.deleteItem(5303, p.getItemSlot(5303), 1);
p.addItem(2436, 1);
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18);
p.setAnimation(364);
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 50 to make this herb.”);
}
}
if(itemID == 5295 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 55) {
p.deleteItem(5295, p.getItemSlot(5295), 1);
p.addItem(2436, 1);
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18);
p.setAnimation(364);
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 55 to make this herb.”);
}
}
if(itemID == 5300 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 60) {
p.deleteItem(5300, p.getItemSlot(5300), 1);
p.addItem(2436, 1);
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18);
p.setAnimation(364);
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 60 to make this herb.”);
}
}
if(itemID == 5296 && objectID == 7965){
if (p.playerLevel[18] >= 70) {
p.deleteItem(5296, p.getItemSlot(5296), 1);
p.addItem(2436, 1);
p.addSkillXP(1500, 18);
p.setAnimation(364);
} else {
p.sendMessage(“You need a farming level of 70 to make this herb.”);
}
}
}
} [/code]

What else do I have to add and where to make this work.

Read full topic

item.title: [iClarity] help
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

sheeba:

Herblore, I have the files for it.

Well what I did for runecrafting is I made a method that takes arguments like the required level, exp given, and the rune that you make.

In my object first click packet i added something like this.

RuneCrafting r = new RuneCrafting();

and this

r.startRC(p, 1,50, 556);
